section.title: RHEL Compute Node Installation Overview
section.para: &kw-hos-phrase; supports RHEL compute nodes, specifically RHEL 7.2. HPE does not ship a Red Hat ISO with &kw-hos; so you will need to provide a copy of the standard RHEL 7.2 ISO (RHEL-7.2-20151030.0-Server-x86_64-dvd1.iso) that can be downloaded from the Red Hat website.
There are two approaches for deploying RHEL compute nodes in &kw-hos;:

listitem.para: Using the lifecycle manager to automatically deploy RHEL Compute Nodes.
Provisioning SLES nodes yourself, either manually or using a third-party tool, and then provide the relevant information to the lifecycle manager.

section.para: These two approaches can be used whether you are installing a cloud for the first time or adding a compute node to an existing cloud.
